main event: A bright unknown object was observed hovering over homes in Jacksonville, Florida, leading to power failures on October 4, 1962.
interesting points: Witnesses described a large bright object hovering partially across the road,The object was so bright that one witness had to shield her eyes,The phenomenon coincided with two power outages within 15 minutes,Other witnesses in the area corroborated seeing the object rise rapidly after the power returned,The event is noted as an unusual power failure case.
sighted object: a large bright object in the sky
witness description: a woman and several other witnesses near the areas where the power failed
